query:
SELECT p.id, p.sku, p.name, p.cost, p.retail, p.listPrice, p.lineCodeId, lc.code as lineCode 
FROM parts p 
LEFT JOIN line_codes lc ON p.lineCodeId = lc.id 
WHERE p.sku = 'DL3614' AND p.isArchived = 0;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Z8LjiwvcvtE25n.root --database b8PSAc4GGbWJXFTqco8XmD --execute SELECT p.id, p.sku, p.name, p.cost, p.retail, p.listPrice, p.lineCodeId, lc.code as lineCode 
FROM parts p 
LEFT JOIN line_codes lc ON p.lineCodeId = lc.id 
WHERE p.sku = 'DL3614' AND p.isArchived = 0;
